2.text: Gather a crab mallet, dull knife, and a claw cracker if desired.

3.text: If you haven't already cooked the crabs, do so.

4.text: Pull off all the legs and claws with a twisting motion.

5.text: Toss the legs (fins) and save the claws.

6.text: Turn the crab over on its back.

7.text: Take the top half and the bottom half in each hand, as if you are opening a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.

8.text: Take this bottom half and break it in half.

9.text: Pick away all the chunks of meat in the body.

10.text: Crack the claws by using the hinged cracker, hitting them with the crab mallet, or using your knife.
